mapper.insert: insert into application (a_uid, a_view, u_uid, h_uid, r_uid) values (SEQ_Application_A_uid.nextval, 0,#{u_uid},#{h_uid},#{r_uid})
mapper.select: select *from Application a left outer join HUSER u on a.u_uid= u.U_UID left outer join RESUME r on a.r_uid=r.R_UID where a.u_uid=1
select *from Application a left outer join HUSER u on a.u_uid= u.U_UID left outer join RESUME r on a.r_uid=r.R_UID where a.h_uid=#{param1} and r.r_gender=0
select *from Application a left outer join HUSER u on a.u_uid= u.U_UID left outer join RESUME r on a.r_uid=r.R_UID where a.h_uid=#{param1} and r.r_gender=1
select * from resume where u_uid = #{u_uid}

select a.*, h.*, to_date (H_REGDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')-round(SYSDATE) dday,r.* from Application a left outer join Hire h on a.h_uid = h.H_UID left outer join RESUME R on a.r_uid = R.R_UID WHERE a.u_uid =#{param1} AND (SYSDATE-a.a_date)<#{param2} AND (a_VIEW=#{param3} or a_view=#{param4}) AND (H_TITLE LIKE #{param5} or H_NAME LIKE #{param5})
